climbs.name: Uncle Anesthesia
climbs.fa: Chris Miller, George Armstrong and Gary Burgess, January 1993

content.description: Thin holds past two bolts lead into a thin crack on this obscurity. Gear belay and walk off.
content.location:
Located on an east-facing wall within a corridor of rocks directly behind

Shit, It's A Brit

.

climbs.name: Shit, It's A Brit
climbs.fa: Todd Gordon, Hamish Morrison, Mike Rodrigue, Cyndie Bransford, 12/1990.

content.description: Bolted line up the middle of a large dark slab that faces south.  Near the top, veer right to clip the last bolt, following the easier terrain.  Crunchy rock and ancient buttonheads, what's not to like?
content.protection: 2 closely-spaced solid bolts at the start (added much later after the FA), then 4 buttonheads, and bolted rap rings.
content.location: The larger formation up and right from Rachel.  Brief talus scrambling to get up to the start.

content.description: An interesting and novel sport route up a wierd ramp on the face of a large boulder (The Miramontes Boulder).  Steep reachy pull at the start (crux) gains access to the ramp.
content.protection: Four bolts, Quick draws only.  Anchors on top.
content.location: Located on a big west facing boulder (The Miramontes Boulder) just in front of the slab route "Shit, It's a Brit."

content.description: This is the slab route left of BDE and Prison for Czech Politicians. The route starts by liebacking a boulder/flake and continues up 4 bolts to an anchor.
content.location: Climbers left of BDE and Prison for Czech Politicians

content.description: Start the route at a bulge where the first bolt is located, climb up and right past 5 more bolts to a 2 bolt anchor/rap.
content.location: This route is located about 25 feet right of BDE in the back rocks of white tank CG

content.description: Scramble up to a perch that meets two parallel dikes. Holds are huge and body position is great. Clip four bolts along the way to a two bolt rap.
content.protection: Four bolts, two bolt anchor rap
content.location: All of the Back Rocks are just east of the campground, however this route is south of Rachel/Shit Its a Brit but further east of Dr. Junkenstein.

content.description: Reach across corridor to mantle up onto a steep face, then leftward and up to easier slab finish.
content.location:
This is located on the right side and far end of a rock corridor that is between the backside of

Rachel

and

Shit, It's A Brit

.

content.description: This is TR variation of the 6 bolt route "Prison for Czech Politicians" after making the mantle move to reach the first bolt instead of continuing up the bolt line on the right, go left onto a thin face with a water groove. Make a 5.10 move at the water groove and continue straight up to a slabby bulge. Make another 5.10 move onto the slab then continue up easy climbing to the 2 bolt anchor for "Prison for Czech Politicians"
content.location: TR variation (left of the bolts) of "Prison For Czech Politicians"

content.description: Climb past 2 bolts on a face to a bulge where the 3rd bolt is located, finish with a 4th bolt on low angle slab.
content.protection: 4 bolts to a 2 bolt anchor. No rap rings use rings from raid.
content.location: In the back rocks of white tank campground. In between Raid and prison for Czech politicians
